biotools.summary: LuxRep is a genome wide methylation analysis tool that models different bisulphite-converted DNA libraries from the same biological replicate (i.e., technical replicates) thereby allowing use of libraries of even low bisulphite conversion rates.

bioschemas.name: LuxRep
bioschemas.summary: LuxRep is a genome wide methylation analysis tool that models different bisulphite-converted DNA libraries from the same biological replicate (i.e., technical replicates) thereby allowing use of libraries of even low bisulphite conversion rates.
